{{Wired embedded system |brand=ihiji |model=INV-APP |revision=-500 |price=200 |est_release_date=09/2011 |manuf_country=Philippines |is_manuf=No |manuf=Ionics EMS |manuf_model=Nimbus |manuf_rev=200 |type=network monitor |pwr_v=110-240 |pwr_amp=0.35 |pwr_conn=AC direct |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6281 |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |cpu1_cores=1 |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F4G08U0E-SCB0 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4T1G084QG-BCF7 |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1116R |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=1.5/2A, 1MHz Dual Step-Down Regulator;Marvell;88PG8227;;2; |flags=RTC w/ battery backup |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |oui_eth=00:26:DB }}
*OEM: ''Ionics EMS Inc.'' Nimbus 200
Composed of 4 circuit boards: * Power board silkscreened with "NIMBUS200_POWER_REV.E00" * Processor board silkscreened with "NIMBUS200 SYSTEM_E00" * Switch board silkscreened with "Nimbus200_Switcher Board_E00" * Network Board silkscreened with "NIMBUS200_DAUGHTER_BOARD_E00"
===Models=== *[[Ihiji INV-APP-500]] *[[Ihiji INV-APP-750]] *[[Ihiji INV-APP-1100]] *[[Ihiji INV-APP-2100]]
